results.title: Crikey There's a Tractor On the Farm
results.creator_credit: Robert Grant, Stephen Mepham and Comedia Productions
results.brief_description: An entertaining look at the need for safety precautions with farm tractors including the use of seatbelts and ear muffs. Written by Robert Grant. Cast: Maurie Fields, Simon Thorpe.

results.title: A Change of Pace
results.brief_description:
A film about the 1983 Australian Lawn Bowls Championship in Adelaide between Jeff Bradley and Jack Christey. Follows the lives of the players both at home and on the greens in the lead-up to the match.

The film begins and concludes with a promotion of the retirement services offered by the ANZ Bank.
results.description:

results.title: The Job Interview
results.creator_credit: Ted Robinson, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description: A depressed job-seeker is frustrated in his attempts to obtain work. His fairy-job mother encourages him to consider his positive attributes and apply them in his interviews. Features Graeme Blundell Julie McGregor.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ted Robinson, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions

results.title: Aluminium from Mine to Metal
results.brief_description: Gives an overview of Alcoa’s main operations in Australia including the refining of bauxite to alumina in West Australia and the extraction of aluminium at Point Henry, Victoria.
results.description: Gives an overview of Alcoa’s main operations in Australia including the refining of bauxite to alumina in West Australia and the extraction of aluminium at Point Henry, Victoria.

results.title: Distance Running
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Coaching and Training for Track and Field Events”.
Coaching tips for distance running events from Olympic athletes and coaches, plus footage of distance events from the Moscow Olympics.

results.title: Compilation Ultimate skills
results.brief_description: Ultimate skills (Australia): Three motorcycle champions explain and demonstrate their skills at trail riding, motocross and road riding. 2.” Survival of the fastest” (U.K.): Shows the evolution of the motorcycle from a primitive machine into a glamorous, sophisticated piece of engineering. Looks at research and development and compares British and Japanese bikes.

Looks at research and development and compares British and Japanese bikes.
